Detailed Description

Environment.h,v 1.23 2002/02/08 01:07:32 coryan Exp

Declare the CORBA_Environment class. Note that this header file only requires a few forward declarations of CORBA classes, this is *very* important because even the ORB needs to know about it; make your changes with care. It is also a good idea trying to minimize cross dependencies between header files.
